channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 10 – Washington DC
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Right... I'll use 7 from now on :)

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I do get more visitors, but not many more (in terms of growth, I'm up 95%. But it only means ~10 more visitors a day). I think it's mostly because when people ask me the same questions over and over again about how my trip is going, I send them to read the blog :)
item.content:encoded: I do get more visitors, but not many more (in terms of growth, I’m up 95%. But it only means ~10 more visitors a day). I think it’s mostly because when people ask me the same questions over and over again about how my trip is going, I send them to read the blog :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: I wonder, do u get more visitors now, due to the daily posts?
item.content:encoded: I wonder, do u get more visitors now, due to the daily posts?
